cmp: 并 (and/furthermore/(not) at all/simultaneously/also/together with/to combine/to join/to merge, amalgamate/combine, and/also/together with)
mng: (of a pair of horses) to pull side by side, to be side by side, to be fused together, parallel (literary style)

exm.mng: (of a pair of horses) to pull side by side, to be side by side, to be fused together, parallel (literary style)
early Tang literary style despised as shallow by the classicists
